column3: Traffic;Kampong Thom: An Angkor Beer and a Cambodia Beer were in a collision in  Trapeang Russey Commune
column5: Kampong Thom Province.------ The crash happened on National Highway 6 at 10.15am
column7: 2019.------ The driver of the Angkor truck was seriously injured
column8: and the driver behind the wheel of the Cambodia company lorry fled the scene before police arrived.------Both vehicles have been taken to the Kampong Svay Inspectorates
column9: waiting for the two sides to resolve the legal issues.
